1.7 µl of solution of conjugation peptide (HWRGWVC) abbreviated as HWR peptide (1.25 mg ml −1) was added to 25 µl of CdS QDs (0.125 mg ml −1) capped with MSA and the mixture was incubated using Thermomixer 5355 (Eppendorf, Germany) at 45 °C, 600 rpm for 1 hour. Subsequently, 1.6 µl of antibody (AB, 1 mg ml −1) was added to the QDs-HWR peptide conjugate. The mixture was again reacted using the Thermomixer at 21 °C, 600 rpm for 1 hour. Then the conjugate QD-AB linked via HWR peptide was ready to use
31 .
